TopicTitle: Is there a mod to refill solid fuel?

Articles.Content: Well, i'm trying to develop my modular reusable SSTO rocket, so on my crew module i have my escape tower, with separatrons, is there a mod to refill these?

why would you refill your escape tower?

It's objective is to pull the capsule away from the rest of the rocket on an abort scenario, so you shouldn't use it until something bad happens.
Well no, after I fire the escape tower and its lying on the ground with now fuel, and I want to re-use it.
... Why would you want to reuse a spent escape tower?
You could use the small radial orange engines, and a oskar b tank instead of seperatrons. It isn't the same thing, but they can be refilled.

Else if you really want to reuse it even though it's on the ground, modify your escape tower's config file to make it run on liquid fuel and oxidizer and refuel it by some way (quantum fuel transfer??)

Kerbals fall out of chairs.
